root: ^Well, this seems to be the place that the organization deemed as a hazardous zone where only elite level soldiers were allowed to plan missions.
^To repeat myself one last time before we all get ourselves killed: YOU ALL ARE NOT ALL THAT.
^Chill out, Sunder, we have you don't we? You're incredibly capable on your own, and you even said we were probably the best team you've been in!
^And most importantly, you know that this is the only way anyone will take us seriously. We have to accomplish something that the organization isn't capable of!
^Have ya'll never thought of why the organization was incapable of clearing this place? It's completely overrun with some very powerful monsters.
^Actually, you know what's interesting? On our walk here we didn't run into a single monster. Not one.
^In fact, that strong smell that I sensed earlier is predominantly coming from here.
^Sunder may be right. Every fiber in my being is telling me to not go any deeper.
^That's exactly what I'm saying. I would rather not lose the likes of you.
^There's already enough suffering in the world as it is.
^I mean, Flux, who's gonna take care of your dear ol' sister if you're gone?
^Sunder, I understand your concern. I know it's hard to let us enter this place, but do you want us to continue living the way we are now?
^Do you genuinely think it's better for us to continue “living” in a society that doesn't want us around?
^Or for us to fall, fighting to bring upon a better world?
^If ya'lls minds are made up, then lets give it our all to conquer this place.
^But remember what's most important right now is that we look out for each another.
^The new system benefits us the most so we're best able to have each other's backs. We'll be at a real disadvantage if any of us goes down in combat, so stay sharp.
